evidence.claim: MIDI Health utilizes AWS services including Lambda and RDS to build scalable applications.
The system supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
MIDI Health performs Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) transactions using X12 formats.
Integration with third-party services is facilitated by RESTful APIs and webhook patterns.
MIDI Health employs Twilio for communication services within their health applications.

icp.icp_reason: MIDI Health utilizes X12 for health data transactions, targeting EDI needs in healthcare.
